zh: 这位是SB管理员负责管理SB服务器日常事务~n输入 `ask sb_manager about 注册` 来注册/查看帐号密码
en: This is SB manager for maintaining SB server affairs~nType `ask sb_manager about register` for registering/checking SB account and password

zh: 这位是BILIBILI管理员负责管理你的BILIBILI日常事务~n输入 `ask bilibili_manager about help` 查看帮助
en: This is BILIBILI manager for maintaining your BILIBILI affairs~nType `ask bilibili_manager about help` for help
